title-group.article-title: Prospecting For Finance Cases? Consider These Issues And Aids

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1996 Journal of Financial Education, Jean L. Heck

abstract.p: This paper provides a framework for selecting cases for finance classes. Building on the extensive literature in the area, prospecting for finance cases is shown to be a function of course level and objectives. The paper provides concrete actions to follow to find and select appropriate finance cases.
